name: dapper-sc-wallet
description: Where the dapper smart contract wallet lives

scripts.verify-ethereum: truffle run verify CloneableWallet --network ethereum && truffle run verify WalletFactory --network ethereum
scripts.verify-sepolia: truffle run verify CloneableWallet --network sepolia && truffle run verify WalletFactory --network sepolia
scripts.verify-polygon: truffle run verify CloneableWallet --network polygon && truffle run verify WalletFactory --network polygon
scripts.verify-mumbai: truffle run verify CloneableWallet --network mumbai && truffle run verify WalletFactory --network mumbai
scripts.verify-bsc: truffle run verify CloneableWallet --network bsc && truffle run verify WalletFactory --network bsc
scripts.verify-bsc_testnet: truffle run verify CloneableWallet --network bsc_testnet && truffle run verify WalletFactory --network bsc_testnet
scripts.verify-avalanche: truffle run verify CloneableWallet --network avalanche && truffle run verify WalletFactory --network avalanche
scripts.verify-avalanche_testnet: truffle run verify CloneableWallet --network avalanche_testnet && truffle run verify WalletFactory --network avalanche_testnet
scripts.verify-optimism: truffle run verify CloneableWallet --network optimism && truffle run verify WalletFactory --network optimism
scripts.verify-optimism_testnet: truffle run verify CloneableWallet --network optimism_testnet && truffle run verify WalletFactory --network optimism_testnet
scripts.verify-arbitrum: truffle run verify CloneableWallet --network arbitrum && truffle run verify WalletFactory --network arbitrum
scripts.verify-arbitrum_testnet: truffle run verify CloneableWallet --network arbitrum_testnet && truffle run verify WalletFactory --network arbitrum_testnet

author: Christopher Scott
